channel.title: Help Barrage error

item.title: Help Barrage error
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();

If you don’t have those methods, add these to your client.java.

public int EntangleDelay;

–

Next add these methods.

public void entangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 60;
}
public void uberentangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 80;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help Barrage error
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

when i barrage on my server it doesn’t freeze people , how can i make it to freeze?
Heres my code:

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You freeze the enemy!”);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
}
}y server it doesn’t freeze people , how can i make it to freeze?

Read full topic
